category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 18 (Job Training)
contents: Article 18 (Job Training) ① The general manager must receive job training on safety and health conducted by the Minister of Employment and Labor. ② The time and period of job training for the general manager pursuant to paragraph 1 shall be in accordance with the following items. ., 1. New training: 6 hours or more, within 3 months of appointment, 2. Refresher training: 6 hours or more, between 3 months before and after every 2 years after completing new or continuing training
